body_html: @peterjc123 are you sure you're not referring to class template argument deduction? This truly is a C++17 feature, but deduction for functions has been there since pretty much forever I think (there's no "since C++XX" on the page I linked).
body_text: @peterjc123 are you sure you're not referring to class template argument deduction? This truly is a C++17 feature, but deduction for functions has been there since pretty much forever I think (there's no "since C++XX" on the page I linked).
body: @peterjc123 are you sure you're not referring to class template argument deduction? This truly is a C++17 feature, but deduction for functions has been there since pretty much forever I think (there's no "since C++XX" on the page I linked).
